div.p: This value set indicates the allowed Medication list values in list.code. The vocabulary selected for this value set aligns with the C-CDA section codes.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
Code
Display
42346-7 Medications on admission (narrative)
10160-0 History of medication use Narrative
75311-1 Discharge medications Narrative

description.value: This value set indicates the allowed Medication list values in list.code. The vocabulary selected for this value set aligns with the C-CDA section codes.
